value:
You received this email to complete the registration process for your account. Please use the confirmation code below to finish the registration process.
If you did not initiate this registration or received this email by mistake, please ignore it.
Your account will not be registered, and no changes will be made.

Thank you for using our service !

Your confirmation code:

You received this email in response to a request for account recovery.
If you received this email by mistake, you can revoke the token provided below yourself, or it will be automatically revoked soon.

Thank you for using our service !

Your unique recovery token:

You received this email to complete your account login.
If you received this email by mistake, please change your password by following the instructions on the relevant page.

Thank you for using our service!

Your confirmation code:

We are sorry to inform you that your JobQuest account has been temporarily suspended.

We understand this may be an inconvenience and are committed to reviewing your situation. If you believe that the block was made in error or you have information that can help resolve this issue, please contact our support team at the following email address:

We are pleased to inform you that your JobQuest account has been successfully unlocked. You can once again enjoy all the features of our service without restrictions.

We understand that the blocking may have caused some inconvenience and thank you for your patience and understanding in this matter.

If you have any questions or require additional assistance, please do not hesitate to contact contact our support team at the following email address:
